channel.title: Client load help please
channel.description: I need to change this: @echo off Title BrokenX Client V1 "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 exit The message that pops up is: ERROR LOADING... PLEASE REPORT! idk what to change client script to. all the ways that i usaully did, didnt work... My computer is brand new and i had to redownload java so thats why i put it as jre7 but it still dont work... Does any know what it could be? If you can be friendly and help me that is amazing... It takes a 100% kind person to do that.

item.title: Client load help please
item.dc:creator: @Ninja111 Ninja111
item.description:
@Ninja111 wrote:

This is a brand new computer and its not fucking working. It’s really pissing me off. I made the ram smaller like you told me to but it didnt work… It says the same message.

If anyone could help me on T.V., Skype, or xbl. Anyway you could help would be appreciated… I just want to play the damn server…

I will also say… I had this working on my old computer… When i got the new computer i took the server from my old computer and put it on my new one.
Now the client does not work on my new computer

Read full topic

item.title: Client load help please
item.dc:creator: @TxSlayer144 TxSlayer144
item.description:
@TxSlayer144 wrote:

Try lowering your ram down you may not have enough ram to run that… lower it down to 500 or 250?

Example -

“C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe” -Xmx512m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe” -“Changehere” Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32

Copy this -
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe” -Xmx250m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32

Read full topic

item.title: Client load help please
item.dc:creator: @Ninja111 Ninja111
item.description:
@Ninja111 wrote:

It didnt work it still says the same message. “Error Loading… Please Report!” It also has alot of things like, File not found Exception: C:\brokenXcache\Maps\mapConfig.txt , and alot others in that same category…

Read full topic

item.title: Client load help please
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

try

@echo off Title BrokenX Client V1 "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause

Read full topic

item.title: Client load help please
item.dc:creator: @Devinhdl Devinhdl
item.description:
@Devinhdl wrote:

Did you put the cache in the C: drive?

Read full topic

item.title: Client load help please
item.dc:creator: @Ninja111 Ninja111
item.description:
@Ninja111 wrote:

I need to change this:
@echo off
Title BrokenX Client V1
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe” -Xmx512m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
exit
The message that pops up is: ERROR LOADING… PLEASE REPORT!
idk what to change client script to. all the ways that i usaully did, didnt work…
My computer is brand new and i had to redownload java so thats why i put it as jre7 but it still dont work…
Does any know what it could be? If you can be friendly and help me that is amazing… It takes a 100% kind person to do that.

Read full topic
